title: The Wild Oasis - Cabin Booking App
description: A full-stack cabin booking app where users can explore, reserve, and manage luxury cabins. Built with Next.js, Supabase, and Google Auth, it offers a secure and seamless user experience.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experience as a MERN Stack Developer and UI/UX Designer. Built using Next.js and designed in Figma, this project reflects my passion for clean, intuitive interfaces and modern development best practices.
points: Designed with a desktop-first approach and fully responsive across all devices.
Integrated reusable components and modular design for scalability.

title: Hulu Landing Page Clone
description: A pixel-perfect clone of Hulu's homepage built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project emphasizes responsive layout, modern web standards, and dynamic UI without any libraries.
points: How to build responsive UIs with flexbox
Handling click events in vanilla JavaScript

title: Outfitted E-commerce App
description: Outfitted is a modern, mobile-first clothing e-commerce app concept designed to deliver a seamless shopping experience for fashion-forward users. This project was fully designed in Figma, applying end-to-end UI/UX design processes—from user research to prototyping.
points: Applied user-centered design based on shopping behavior.
Designed from wireframes to high-fidelity mockups.
Built key flows: onboarding, browse, cart, checkout, tracking.
Created a full interactive prototype in Figma.

title: Trivago Cabin Retreat
description: A relaxing, nature-themed cabin booking UI inspired by digital detox experiences. Designed to promote calmness and simplicity with clean layout and immersive imagery.

title: Behance Design Collection
description: A curated visual design showcase featuring my best poster designs, creative packaging work, animated motion graphics, and unique logo designs—all published on Behance.
points: Poster design for events and promotions

title: React Portfolio (Single Page App)
description: A minimalist single-page portfolio website created using React.js, focused on smooth UI/UX and component-driven design.
points: Built with React Hooks and component-based architecture
